Class ListenerTextArea

java.lang.Object
  |

              +--java.awt.TextArea
                    |
                    +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.misc.ListenerTextArea
public class ListenerTextArea
extends TextArea

This class exists so that listeners can work in browsers that don't support 1.1 events. Argh.

See Also:
Serialized Form
